name: RocketBird (Dragon Chasing Games)
description:
In RocketBird you take on the role of a brave astronaut tasked with navigating your spacecraft through a treacherous space base! Will your quick reflexes and steady hand lead the way to a high score? Fear not, brave astronaut! Strap on your space suit, grab your crank, and get ready for the challenge of RocketBird! Difficulty and Dark/Light mode toggle are available in the playdate menu.

Please see the official instructions for sideloading a game on Playdate.
